q: the realignment atop the company's Server and Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. , made his second, headline-grabbing appearance at Britain's inquiry into the Iraq war. Some speculate that the Tony Blair appearance was exactly why Andy Coulson announced his resignation. Speaking Friday, David Cameron said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, David Cameron said. It's Michael Vick 's first trip to Hawaii as an Eagle, yet more importantly, it's the first since he was sentenced to prison for his role financing a dogfighting operation four years ago. This one feels great due to the fact that I've been through so much, Michael Vick said yesterday after the NFC's first practice of the week.`` To be able to get back to this position is paramount to me, and I'm just thankful.'' friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
